00056 
00057 void lov_dump_lmm_common(int level, void *lmmp)
00058 {
00059         struct lov_mds_md *lmm = lmmp;
00060         struct ost_id   oi;
00061 
00062         lmm_oi_le_to_cpu(&oi, &lmm->lmm_oi);
00063         CDEBUG(level, "objid "DOSTID", magic 0x%08x, pattern %#x\n",
00064                POSTID(&oi), le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_magic),
00065                le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern));
00066         CDEBUG(level, "stripe_size %u, stripe_count %u, layout_gen %u\n",
00067                le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_size),
00068                le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_count),
00069                le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_layout_gen));
00070 }
00071 
00072 static void lov_dump_lmm_objects(int level, struct lov_ost_data *lod,
00073                                  int stripe_count)
00074 {
00075         int i;
00076 
00077         if (stripe_count > LOV_V1_INSANE_STRIPE_COUNT) {
00078                 CDEBUG(level, "bad stripe_count %u > max_stripe_count %u\n",
00079                        stripe_count, LOV_V1_INSANE_STRIPE_COUNT);
00080                 return;
00081         }
00082 
00083         for (i = 0; i < stripe_count; ++i, ++lod) {
00084                 struct ost_id   oi;
00085 
00086                 ostid_le_to_cpu(&lod->l_ost_oi, &oi);
00087                 CDEBUG(level, "stripe %u idx %u subobj "DOSTID"\n", i,
00088                        le32_to_cpu(lod->l_ost_idx), POSTID(&oi));
00089         }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void lov_dump_lmm_v1(int level, struct lov_mds_md_v1 *lmm)
00093 {
00094         lov_dump_lmm_common(level, lmm);
00095         lov_dump_lmm_objects(level, lmm->lmm_objects,
00096                              le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_count));
00097 }
00098 
00099 void lov_dump_lmm_v3(int level, struct lov_mds_md_v3 *lmm)
00100 {
00101         lov_dump_lmm_common(level, lmm);
00102         CDEBUG(level,"pool_name "LOV_POOLNAMEF"\n", lmm->lmm_pool_name);
00103         lov_dump_lmm_objects(level, lmm->lmm_objects,
00104                              le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_count));
00105 }
00106 
00107 void lov_dump_lmm(int level, void *lmm)
00108 {
00109         int magic;
00110 
00111         magic = le32_to_cpu(((struct lov_mds_md *)lmm)->lmm_magic);
00112         switch (magic) {
00113         case LOV_MAGIC_V1:
00114                 lov_dump_lmm_v1(level, (struct lov_mds_md_v1 *)lmm);
00115                 break;
00116         case LOV_MAGIC_V3:
00117                 lov_dump_lmm_v3(level, (struct lov_mds_md_v3 *)lmm);
00118                 break;
00119         default:
00120                 CDEBUG(level, "unrecognized lmm_magic %x, assuming %x\n",
00121                        magic, LOV_MAGIC_V1);
00122                 lov_dump_lmm_common(level, lmm);
00123                 break;
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00135 ssize_t lov_lsm_pack(const struct lov_stripe_md *lsm, void *buf,
00136                      size_t buf_size)
00137 {
00138         struct lov_mds_md_v1 *lmmv1 = buf;
00139         struct lov_mds_md_v3 *lmmv3 = buf;
00140         struct lov_ost_data_v1 *lmm_objects;
00141         size_t lmm_size;
00142         unsigned int i;
00143         ENTRY;
00144 
00145         lmm_size = lov_mds_md_size(lsm->lsm_stripe_count, lsm->lsm_magic);
00146         if (buf_size == 0)
00147                 RETURN(lmm_size);
00148 
00149         if (buf_size < lmm_size)
00150                 RETURN(-ERANGE);
00151 
00152         /* lmmv1 and lmmv3 point to the same struct and have the
00153          * same first fields
00154          */
00155         lmmv1->lmm_magic = cpu_to_le32(lsm->lsm_magic);
00156         lmm_oi_cpu_to_le(&lmmv1->lmm_oi, &lsm->lsm_oi);
00157         lmmv1->lmm_stripe_size = cpu_to_le32(lsm->lsm_stripe_size);
00158         lmmv1->lmm_stripe_count = cpu_to_le16(lsm->lsm_stripe_count);
00159         lmmv1->lmm_pattern = cpu_to_le32(lsm->lsm_pattern);
00160         lmmv1->lmm_layout_gen = cpu_to_le16(lsm->lsm_layout_gen);
00161 
00162         if (lsm->lsm_magic == LOV_MAGIC_V3) {
00163                 CLASSERT(sizeof(lsm->lsm_pool_name) ==
00164                          sizeof(lmmv3->lmm_pool_name));
00165                 strlcpy(lmmv3->lmm_pool_name, lsm->lsm_pool_name,
00166                         sizeof(lmmv3->lmm_pool_name));
00167                 lmm_objects = lmmv3->lmm_objects;
00168         } else {
00169                 lmm_objects = lmmv1->lmm_objects;
00170         }
00171 
00172         for (i = 0; i < lsm->lsm_stripe_count; i++) {
00173                 struct lov_oinfo *loi = lsm->lsm_oinfo[i];
00174 
00175                 ostid_cpu_to_le(&loi->loi_oi, &lmm_objects[i].l_ost_oi);
00176                 lmm_objects[i].l_ost_gen = cpu_to_le32(loi->loi_ost_gen);
00177                 lmm_objects[i].l_ost_idx = cpu_to_le32(loi->loi_ost_idx);
00178         }
00179 
00180         RETURN(lmm_size);
00181 }
00182 
00183 /* Find the max stripecount we should use */
00184 __u16 lov_get_stripecnt(struct lov_obd *lov, __u32 magic, __u16 stripe_count)
00185 {
00186         __u32 max_stripes = LOV_MAX_STRIPE_COUNT_OLD;
00187 
00188         if (!stripe_count)
00189                 stripe_count = lov->desc.ld_default_stripe_count;
00190         if (stripe_count > lov->desc.ld_active_tgt_count)
00191                 stripe_count = lov->desc.ld_active_tgt_count;
00192         if (!stripe_count)
00193                 stripe_count = 1;
00194 
00195         /* stripe count is based on whether ldiskfs can handle
00196          * larger EA sizes */
00197         if (lov->lov_ocd.ocd_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_MAX_EASIZE &&
00198             lov->lov_ocd.ocd_max_easize)
00199                 max_stripes = lov_mds_md_max_stripe_count(
00200                         lov->lov_ocd.ocd_max_easize, magic);
00201 
00202         if (stripe_count > max_stripes)
00203                 stripe_count = max_stripes;
00204 
00205         return stripe_count;
00206 }
00207 
00208 static int lov_verify_lmm(void *lmm, int lmm_bytes, __u16 *stripe_count)
00209 {
00210         int rc;
00211 
00212         if (lsm_op_find(le32_to_cpu(*(__u32 *)lmm)) == NULL) {
00213                 char *buffer;
00214                 int sz;
00215 
00216                 CERROR("bad disk LOV MAGIC: 0x%08X; dumping LMM (size=%d):\n",
00217                        le32_to_cpu(*(__u32 *)lmm), lmm_bytes);
00218                 sz = lmm_bytes * 2 + 1;
00219                 OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(buffer, sz);
00220                 if (buffer != NULL) {
00221                         int i;
00222 
00223                         for (i = 0; i < lmm_bytes; i++)
00224                                 sprintf(buffer+2*i, "%.2X", ((char *)lmm)[i]);
00225                         buffer[sz - 1] = '\0';
00226                         CERROR("%s\n", buffer);
00227                         OBD_FREE_LARGE(buffer, sz);
00228                 }
00229                 return -EINVAL;
00230         }
00231         rc = lsm_op_find(le32_to_cpu(*(__u32 *)lmm))->lsm_lmm_verify(lmm,
00232                                      lmm_bytes, stripe_count);
00233         return rc;
00234 }
00235 
00236 struct lov_stripe_md *lov_lsm_alloc(u16 stripe_count, u32 pattern, u32 magic)
00237 {
00238         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm;
00239         unsigned int i;
00240         ENTRY;
00241 
00242         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "alloc lsm, stripe_count %u\n",
00243                (unsigned int)stripe_count);
00244 
00245         lsm = lsm_alloc_plain(stripe_count);
00246         if (lsm == NULL) {
00247                 CERROR("cannot allocate LSM stripe_count %u\n",
00248                        (unsigned int)stripe_count);
00249                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00250         }
00251 
00252         atomic_set(&lsm->lsm_refc, 1);
00253         spin_lock_init(&lsm->lsm_lock);
00254         lsm->lsm_magic = magic;
00255         lsm->lsm_stripe_count = stripe_count;
00256         lsm->lsm_maxbytes = LUSTRE_EXT3_STRIPE_MAXBYTES * stripe_count;
00257         lsm->lsm_pattern = pattern;
00258         lsm->lsm_pool_name[0] = '\0';
00259         lsm->lsm_layout_gen = 0;
00260         if (stripe_count > 0)
00261                 lsm->lsm_oinfo[0]->loi_ost_idx = ~0;
00262 
00263         for (i = 0; i < stripe_count; i++)
00264                 loi_init(lsm->lsm_oinfo[i]);
00265 
00266         RETURN(lsm);
00267 }
00268 
00269 int lov_free_memmd(struct lov_stripe_md **lsmp)
00270 {
00271         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm = *lsmp;
00272         int refc;
00273 
00274         *lsmp = NULL;
00275         refc = atomic_dec_return(&lsm->lsm_refc);
00276         LASSERT(refc >= 0);
00277         if (refc == 0) {
00278                 LASSERT(lsm_op_find(lsm->lsm_magic) != NULL);
00279                 lsm_op_find(lsm->lsm_magic)->lsm_free(lsm);
00280         }
00281         return refc;
00282 }
00283 
00284 /* Unpack LOV object metadata from disk storage.  It is packed in LE byte
00285  * order and is opaque to the networking layer.
00286  */
00287 struct lov_stripe_md *lov_unpackmd(struct lov_obd *lov, struct lov_mds_md *lmm,
00288                                    size_t lmm_size)
00289 {
00290         struct lov_stripe_md *lsm;
00291         u16 stripe_count;
00292         u32 magic;
00293         u32 pattern;
00294         int rc;
00295         ENTRY;
00296 
00297         rc = lov_verify_lmm(lmm, lmm_size, &stripe_count);
00298         if (rc != 0)
00299                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00300 
00301         magic = le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_magic);
00302         pattern = le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_pattern);
00303 
00304         lsm = lov_lsm_alloc(stripe_count, pattern, magic);
00305         if (IS_ERR(lsm))
00306                 RETURN(lsm);
00307 
00308         LASSERT(lsm_op_find(magic) != NULL);
00309         rc = lsm_op_find(magic)->lsm_unpackmd(lov, lsm, lmm);
00310         if (rc != 0) {
00311                 lov_free_memmd(&lsm);
00312                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00313         }
00314 
00315         RETURN(lsm);
00316 }
00317 
00318 /* Retrieve object striping information.
00319  *
00320  * @lump is a pointer to an in-core struct with lmm_ost_count indicating
00321  * the maximum number of OST indices which will fit in the user buffer.
00322  * lmm_magic must be LOV_USER_MAGIC.
00323  */
00324 int lov_getstripe(struct lov_object *obj, struct lov_stripe_md *lsm,
00325                   struct lov_user_md __user *lump)
00326 {
00327         /* we use lov_user_md_v3 because it is larger than lov_user_md_v1 */
00328         struct lov_mds_md       *lmmk;
00329         struct lov_user_md_v3   lum;
00330         u32                     stripe_count;
00331         size_t                  lum_size;
00332         size_t                  lmmk_size;
00333         ssize_t                 lmm_size;
00334         int                     rc;
00335         ENTRY;
00336 
00337         if (lsm->lsm_magic != LOV_MAGIC_V1 && lsm->lsm_magic != LOV_MAGIC_V3) {
00338                 CERROR("bad LSM MAGIC: 0x%08X != 0x%08X nor 0x%08X\n",
00339                        lsm->lsm_magic, LOV_MAGIC_V1, LOV_MAGIC_V3);
00340                 GOTO(out, rc = -EIO);
00341         }
00342 
00343         if (!lsm_is_released(lsm))
00344                 stripe_count = lsm->lsm_stripe_count;
00345         else
00346                 stripe_count = 0;
00347 
00348         /* we only need the header part from user space to get lmm_magic and
00349          * lmm_stripe_count, (the header part is common to v1 and v3) */
00350         lum_size = sizeof(struct lov_user_md_v1);
00351         if (copy_from_user(&lum, lump, lum_size))
00352                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00353 
00354         if (lum.lmm_magic != LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1 &&
00355             lum.lmm_magic != LOV_USER_MAGIC_V3 &&
00356             lum.lmm_magic != LOV_USER_MAGIC_SPECIFIC)
00357                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00358 
00359         if (lum.lmm_stripe_count != 0 && lum.lmm_stripe_count < stripe_count) {
00360                 /* Return right size of stripe to user */
00361                 lum.lmm_stripe_count = stripe_count;
00362                 rc = copy_to_user(lump, &lum, lum_size);
00363                 GOTO(out, rc = -EOVERFLOW);
00364         }
00365 
00366         lmmk_size = lov_mds_md_size(stripe_count, lsm->lsm_magic);
00367 
00368         OBD_ALLOC_LARGE(lmmk, lmmk_size);
00369         if (lmmk == NULL)
00370                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00371 
00372         lmm_size = lov_lsm_pack(lsm, lmmk, lmmk_size);
00373         if (lmm_size < 0)
00374                 GOTO(out_free, rc = lmm_size);
00375 
00376         /* FIXME: Bug 1185 - copy fields properly when structs change */
00377         /* struct lov_user_md_v3 and struct lov_mds_md_v3 must be the same */
00378         CLASSERT(sizeof(lum) == sizeof(struct lov_mds_md_v3));
00379         CLASSERT(sizeof(lum.lmm_objects[0]) == sizeof(lmmk->lmm_objects[0]));
00380 
00381         if (cpu_to_le32(LOV_MAGIC) != LOV_MAGIC &&
00382             (lmmk->lmm_magic == cpu_to_le32(LOV_MAGIC_V1) ||
00383              lmmk->lmm_magic == cpu_to_le32(LOV_MAGIC_V3))) {
00384                 lustre_swab_lov_mds_md(lmmk);
00385                 lustre_swab_lov_user_md_objects(
00386                                 (struct lov_user_ost_data *)lmmk->lmm_objects,
00387                                 lmmk->lmm_stripe_count);
00388         }
00389 
00390         if (lum.lmm_magic == LOV_USER_MAGIC) {
00391                 /* User request for v1, we need skip lmm_pool_name */
00392                 if (lmmk->lmm_magic == LOV_MAGIC_V3) {
00393                         memmove(((struct lov_mds_md_v1 *)lmmk)->lmm_objects,
00394                                 ((struct lov_mds_md_v3 *)lmmk)->lmm_objects,
00395                                 lmmk->lmm_stripe_count *
00396                                 sizeof(struct lov_ost_data_v1));
00397                         lmm_size -= LOV_MAXPOOLNAME;
00398                 }
00399         } else {
00400                 /* if v3 we just have to update the lum_size */
00401                 lum_size = sizeof(struct lov_user_md_v3);
00402         }
00403 
00404         /* User wasn't expecting this many OST entries */
00405         if (lum.lmm_stripe_count == 0)
00406                 lmm_size = lum_size;
00407         else if (lum.lmm_stripe_count < lmmk->lmm_stripe_count)
00408                 GOTO(out_free, rc = -EOVERFLOW);
00409         /*
00410          * Have a difference between lov_mds_md & lov_user_md.
00411          * So we have to re-order the data before copy to user.
00412          */
00413         lum.lmm_stripe_count = lmmk->lmm_stripe_count;
00414         lum.lmm_layout_gen = lmmk->lmm_layout_gen;
00415         ((struct lov_user_md *)lmmk)->lmm_layout_gen = lum.lmm_layout_gen;
00416         ((struct lov_user_md *)lmmk)->lmm_stripe_count = lum.lmm_stripe_count;
00417         if (copy_to_user(lump, lmmk, lmm_size))
00418                 GOTO(out_free, rc = -EFAULT);
00419 
00420         GOTO(out_free, rc = 0);
00421 out_free:
00422         OBD_FREE_LARGE(lmmk, lmmk_size);
00423 out:
00424         return rc;
00425 }
